/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. On the right side of the street, there's a white building with a red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the left side, there's a gray building with a red awning, mirroring the red roof of the building on the opposite side. The image is captured using a fisheye lens, which gives it a distorted circular edge, adding an artistic touch to the photograph.
